xt:extension.xt:name: CustomOpenRedirect

div.p: This plugin installs a redirect handler for an URL opened in <oXygen. Such a plugin must provide an implementation of ro.sync.exml.plugin.openredirect.OpenRedirectExtension which can redirect opened URLs in Oxygen.

ol.li: You can decide that when a ZIP archive gets opened a file from the archive must be automatically opened as well.
When a SVG gets opened it is opened both in the main editor and in the image previewer.
Open a totally different location from the original selected URL.
